channel.title: D&D Eberron, World Wide Wrestling, Hearts of Wulin
channel.description:
On the new Gauntlet Podcast @Sandy and I talk with @Tylom, frequent Gauntlet GM and contributor to Gauntlet initiatives including coordinating Gauntlet Facilitator Camp. We talk games and re-visit WWW from a GM's perspective.
Content Warning for Segment Two starting at 40:25: death; loss; COVID pandemic You can find that episode here: https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-gauntlet-podcast/dd-eberron-world-wide-wrestling-hearts-of-wulin
